Control.ttp: itThis page provides information related to System Settings.

Control.lbl: itBypass proxy server for local addresses:
Control.ttp: itSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
itChecked indicates that Proxy is enabled on this device.
itClick to display online help related to this page...
itClick to open the print dialog for sending the contents of this page to the default printer...
itClick to refresh the contents of this page...

Messages.Message: it'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
it'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
it'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
it'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
